
## ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
## Test programs for casa/HDF5

SET (tests
  tHDF5DataSet
  tHDF5File
  tHDF5Record
  )

## ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
## Build the test programs

FOREACH (src ${tests})
  ## compiler instructions
  ADD_EXECUTABLE (${src} ${src}.cc)
  ## linker instructions
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (${src} casa_casa ${HDF5_LIBRARIES} ${libm})
  ## testing 
  add_test (${src} ${src})
ENDFOREACH (src)

## ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
## Installation

install (TARGETS ${tests}
  RUNTIME DESTINATION bin
  LIBRARY DESTINATION lib
  ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib
)
